sql_mapping.insert: insert into mu_user_type (name, created_date, modified_date) values ('#name#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
insert into mu_user_type (user_type_id, name, created_date, modified_date) values (#user_type_id#, '#name#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
sql_mapping.update: update mu_user_type set name='#name#', modified_date='#modified_date#' where user_type_id=#user_type_id#
sql_mapping.select: select count(user_type_id) total from mu_user_type where #conditions#
